channel.title: Comments on: Four months of South America in photos

item.title: By: Patagonia On The Web - March 2015 | Swoop Patagonia's Blog
item.dc:creator: Patagonia On The Web - March 2015 | Swoop Patagonia's Blog
item.description: […] of doing so. Travel journalist @SarahDuff put up some incredible photo’s of her 4 month adventure through South America and a great in-depth look at her time in Patagonia, these are essential reads for anyone thinking […]
